meanings.sent1: She felt the slumpiest after staying up all night.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the students, he looked the slumpiest in his wrinkled shirt.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked slumpier than the dog after playing in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The slumpiest cake in the bakery was sadly left uneaten.
meanings.sent5: The slumpiest cloud in the sky seemed to be dragging its feet.

meanings.sent1: After the long hike, she felt the slumpiest she had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: He was the slumpiest of all the players on the team.
meanings.sent3: The slumpiest pumpkin at the patch was chosen for the competition.
meanings.sent4: The slumpiest tree in the forest seemed to be carrying the weight of the world.
meanings.sent5: The slumpiest building in town had a roof that seemed to sag in defeat.
